AddressInfo.Title: AC at Bona Bona Game Lodge
AddressInfo.AddressLine1: N12 Treasure Route, Between Klerksdorp and Wolmaransstad
AddressInfo.AccessComments:
Entry Point	
Turn left on the N12 from Klerksdorp into Bona-Bona Game Lodge. Follow the road for 3.258km until a circle is reached. Turn left at the circle. Go to the second solar parking.

GeneralComments:
Green Energy
Open Hours Restricted
No Reservations Allowed
Charging is billed
Backup Power at Site
a hotel at site
Restaurant at site
site under video surveillance
